Anchorage.Highland Academy Charter School: Highland Academy Charter School (formerly Highland Tech High School) is a competency based school in Anchorage, Alaska in the Anchorage School District. It is a charter school whose focus is a learning approach in which all students must demonstrate proficiency in a selection of standards. It was the first standards based school in the Anchorage School District (ASD) and had its first graduating class on May 31, 2006.
